entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 13.
